verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Nebuzaradan <S%H5018><s%> captain <S%H9538><s%> of the bodyguard <S%H2876><s%> had released <S%H7971><s%> him from Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> when he had taken <S%H3947><s%> him bound <S%H631><s%> in chains, <S%H246><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the exiles <S%H1546><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> who were being exiled <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

Now the captain <S%H9538><s%> of the bodyguard <S%H2876><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H384><s%> calamity <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%>

and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has brought <S%H935><s%> [it] on and done <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as He promised. <S%H1696><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> you [people] sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to His voice, <S%H6963><s%> therefore this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> has happened <S%H1961><s%> to you.

"But now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am freeing <S%H6605><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> from the chains <S%H246><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are on your hands. <S%H3027><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you would prefer <S%H2895><s%> <S%H5869><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> with me to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> come <S%H935><s%> [along,] and I will look <S%H7760><s%> <S%H5869><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> you; but if <S%H518><s%> you would prefer <S%H7489><s%> <S%H5869><s%> not to come <S%H935><s%> with me to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> never <S%H2308><s%> mind. <S%H2308><s%> Look, <S%H7200><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you; go <S%H1980><s%> wherever <S%H8033><s%> it seems good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> for you to go. <S%H1980><s%>"

As Jeremiah was still <S%H5750><s%> not going <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> [he said,] "Go <S%H7725><s%> on back <S%H7725><s%> then to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam, <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> has appointed <S%H6485><s%> over the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and stay <S%H3427><s%> with him among <S%H8432><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> or <S%H176><s%> else go <S%H1980><s%> anywhere <S%H3605><s%> it seems right <S%H3477><s%> for you to go. <S%H1980><s%>" So the captain <S%H9538><s%> of the bodyguard <S%H2876><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him a ration <S%H737><s%> and a gift <S%H4864><s%> and let <S%H7971><s%> him go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> went <S%H935><s%> to Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> with him among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who were left <S%H7604><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

Now all <S%H3605><s%> the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> that were in the field, <S%H7704><s%> they and their men, <S%H376><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had appointed <S%H6485><s%> Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%> and that he had put <S%H6485><s%> him in charge <S%H6485><s%> of the men, <S%H376><s%> women <S%H802><s%> and children, <S%H2945><s%> those of the poorest <S%H1803><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had not been exiled <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

So they came <S%H935><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> along with Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> and Johanan <S%H3076><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> and Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Tanhumeth, <S%H8576><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephai <S%H5778><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> and Jezaniah <S%H3153><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Maacathite, <S%H4602><s%> [both] they and their men. <S%H376><s%>

Then Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam, <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to them and to their men, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Do not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of serving <S%H5647><s%> the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%> stay <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> that it may go <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> with you.

"Now as for me, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to stay <S%H3427><s%> at Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> [for you] before <S%H6440><s%> the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> who <S%H834><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to us; but as for you, gather <S%H622><s%> in wine <S%H3196><s%> and summer <S%H7019><s%> fruit <S%H7019><s%> and oil, <S%H8081><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> [them] in your [storage] vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> that you have taken <S%H8610><s%> over. <S%H8610><s%>"

Likewise also <S%H1571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were in Moab <S%H4124><s%> and among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> and in Edom, <S%H9000><s%> and who <S%H834><s%> were in all <S%H3605><s%> the [other] countries, <S%H776><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had left <S%H5414><s%> a remnant <S%H7611><s%> for Judah <S%H3063><s%> and that he had appointed <S%H6485><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam, <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan. <S%H8227><s%>

Then all <S%H3605><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> the places <S%H4725><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> they had been driven <S%H5080><s%> away <S%H5080><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> in wine <S%H3196><s%> and summer <S%H7019><s%> fruit <S%H7019><s%> in great <S%H3966><s%> abundance. <S%H7235><s%>

Now Johanan <S%H3076><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> that were in the field <S%H7704><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%>

and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Are you well <S%H3045><s%> aware <S%H3045><s%> that Baalis <S%H1185><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%> to take <S%H5221><s%> your life <S%H5315><s%>?" But Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> did not believe <S%H539><s%> them.

Then Johanan <S%H3076><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> in Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Let me go <S%H1980><s%> and kill <S%H5221><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> and not a man <S%H376><s%> will know! <S%H3045><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> should he take <S%H5221><s%> your life, <S%H5315><s%> so that all <S%H3605><s%> the Jews <S%H3063><s%> who are gathered <S%H6908><s%> to you should be scattered <S%H6327><s%> and the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> perish?"

But Gedaliah <S%H9072><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Johanan <S%H3076><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> "Do not do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> for you are telling <S%H1696><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> about <S%H413><s%> Ishmael. <S%H3458><s%>"
